### R Notes
- Knit HTML is ~equivalent to `Rscript -e "knitr::knit2html('RMARKDOWN-FILE.Rmd')"`
- YAML frontmatter
```
---
title: 'Example'
---
```
- Can add YAML frontmatter to R script, but need `#'`
```
#' ---
#' title: 'Example'
#' ---
```
- to keep md
```
output:
    html_document:
        keep_md: yes
```
